website_summaries.verdict: A no-frills set with some structural issues.
pros: A basic set with a sleek, wood-like finish
Boards are regulation size (2 x 4 feet) with collapsible legs for easy storage
cons: The leg are wobbly, and the stitching on the bags is flimsy
The boards aren't as robust as those made of wood-like materials

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last 2 weeks before deteriorating
customer_reviews.text: This product has been out of its packaging for 2 weeks and is completely oxidized. It is particle board construction and I didn't think it would last long but 2 weeks is rediculous.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Schimmelpfennig

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: This cornhole game is made of very poor quality wood. All corners were dented in and the top was coming off.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: we've had these for about four months. They are coming apart, and for some reason, one of them had a white powder coat of paint on the surface that has gradually come off and covered the bean bags in residue. Also, the bags are falling apart. One of them had to be sewed back up within the first two weeks of use. The one cool aspect about this set is the velcro that allows the two boards to stay together with the bags inside. It makes it nice for storage and transportation. Recommend spending a bit more and get a better quality version, or just make your own (which is what we are going to do)
customer_reviews.author: S. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Truth in advertising?
customer_reviews.text: Description says 'all wood' or 'wooden,' and I would say that's a bit of an exaggeration. The most important parts of the boards (the legs and surface) were really cheap particle board. The main surfaces were covered with a wood-look sticker that were way too slippery and began to peel after 4 games. The bags appeared to be decent (they didn't break after 4 games), but each time we threw, a poof of white dust came out of the bags when they landed on the board. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: BeABetterPerson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wood - pressboard. Ruined before we received it!
customer_reviews.text: Awful quality! Top layer is cheap laminate over pressboard. Corners all chipped when opened box. For an outdoor game construction they should be ashame to sell this. Worst quality sorry to of wasted our money. Cheap and can never be exposed to rain or even a hard hit from a corn bag. Defeats the purpose of the game. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Halloran

customer_reviews.title: Corn bags too stiff
customer_reviews.text: While the wooden corn hole game is sturdy enough, it has ragged edges that can cut your hands when setting it up. However, the biggest disappointment were the bags which are stiff like boards. The corn filling is inside heavy duty square plastic bags that are inside the canvas outer covering, very awkward to hold and throw. Also, note that there is no counter included in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Margarethe Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Two bags ripped... disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The Boards are fine. The boards are made well enough... if I take care to bring them in from the weather, they should last a long time. The bags, however, are filled with some cheap white filling... not even pellets. 2 of the bags ripped on the first throw. Need to spend another $40-$50 on 2 sets of corn-filled bags... hopefully, better quality. AGAIN... the boards are fine. Just expect to get new bags with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Myoder71

customer_reviews.title: They look good but they are definitely not built well
customer_reviews.text: I've only for about 8 months and used it maybe 3 times. Unfortunately they are already coming apart the bottom sides have broken off and I've had to replace them twice. They look good but they are definitely not built well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: They were great for one season
customer_reviews.text: don't bother with these. They were great for one season. They were stored under the deck during winter and completely fell apart. I just ordered some double the cost, my friend has the ones I ordered and they are very durable and heavy duty. I should've just bit the bullet and didn't cheap out. Don't cheap out, just get the good ones
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Klann

customer_reviews.title: Great Boards, Terribke Bags
customer_reviews.text: The boards are great! The bean bags are incredibly cheap and we had to get a second set replaced after the first set broke the first time we used them. We now have completely different bag since these ones are so terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn King

customer_reviews.title: Works, but bags could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Board had one edge a bit rough...could have been the shipping dinged it. Two red bags already need re-sewing. The fabric was cut too close to the stitching and they pulled apart at the seam. I have extra bags, and they're fine plus the blue bags are not doing this yet, so I'm assuming it was one person's sewing. The bags our league uses haven't torn like that this year.
customer_reviews.author: d n s

customer_reviews.title: Bags are very poor quality, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: One red bag broke during the first game played. Two other red bags broke open within one day of opening this game. The game is essentially unusable without the bags. Not going to take the time and energy to return the entire game, buying replacement bags elsewhere. Be warned, the included bags with this game are junk. Can see in the image that one bag is original red color because it was brought inside on day one, ripped. The other ripped bags have sat unused outside until today and show signs of weather but were broken after only one day of normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McAleer

customer_reviews.title: Great game - fun to play - the latest backyard craze!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Well-built, fun to play! I'm a freelance artist, so I took the liberty of modifying my gameboards with a couple of my favorite paintings!
customer_reviews.author: Smokehouse Dave

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality boards!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality boards! The boards were splintering as we took them out of the box, the top appears to be wood grain 'contact' paper that is peeling around the edges after the 2nd use and one of the boards has a shorter leg, so if you want to use it you have to find something to shim it to keep it level. We didn't pull them out of the box when we received them, they went straight into our RV, unfortunately for us, we didn't use them until it was too late to return them. Very disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jill D

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Came today, I opened the box it shipped in, found white stuff all over it, it looked like it could of been plaster and it wiped off with damp paper towel, and a nice big chip on playing surface, and which I took a photo of. Quality must not be number one, I usually don't go by reviews and I wished I did with this purchase. Haven't used it yet, but I hope it will last.
customer_reviews.author: David E

customer_reviews.title: Ships poorly
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a cornhole tournament raffle prize in honor of my late nephew. The box came pretty beat up. I opened it, but unfortunately, didn't look at the reverse side - there was a chip of wood missing near the hole and there was warping of the veneer on the flat top. The sides and corners were packed & protected well. I couldn't donate it as it looked like it was a used item. It's too late, too clumsy to try and repackage, too large and very heavy to return so I'm stuck. It would be a nice set otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: Great regulation size set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for price, good construction. My only thing is inside the hole I wish was also finished like top of the board, and clear coat the legs so wont break down and will keep from splitting or rot if gets wets/damp.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIEPEACOCK

customer_reviews.title: Did not care for the boards. Used them about ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for the boards. Used them about 4 times and the laminate (which I did not care for) started to peel off, so I returned them for a refund. Haven't purchased any new ones yet, but I will definitely read the description to make sure the surface is NOT a laminate.
customer_reviews.author: Chaser1

customer_reviews.title: Boards are great, bags were popped open first use.
customer_reviews.text: The boards deserve 4-5 stars, but the first night the bean bags were used one popped open. They also puff up with some sort of sand or dust when thrown. The bean bags are horrible. We need a new set. This was after one night.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Perreault

customer_reviews.title: Pressboard flimsy wood.
customer_reviews.text: Description says wooden. In fact it is flimsy pressboard. First time used, light weight 4 year old stepped on it, and it cracked, making it useless. Returning it. Says regulation SIZE, but NOT fully regulation. Don't think front edge is high enough for standard. Buy one with "real" 1/2 inch plywood.
customer_reviews.author: Judge Dean

customer_reviews.title: Not a huge deal though because they still carry easy because they are heavy enough to stay together
customer_reviews.text: The velcro that came on there to hold them together ripped off immediately. Not a huge deal though because they still carry easy because they are heavy enough to stay together. Main reason for only three stars is that one of my bags ripped along the seem during the second game played. Well built though.
customer_reviews.author: Jess L.

customer_reviews.title: Classic game for a garden party
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for a housewarming party I had since I've seen how much people love to play at bars. It came fast and I was impressed by the quality of the wood and how nicely the game stores in my garage. It was a huge hit at my party which ended up having teams of people playing.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Higbee

customer_reviews.title: Correct size and it connects together to make it easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. These are not durable and will not take any abuse. Mine arrived broken but after seeing the construction I will not get the same set again. Correct size and it connects together to make it easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Hilliker

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on the front porch and ready to play in the backyard in seconds!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and though the box looked a little rough, everything inside is in perfect condition. No need to build anything as it comes pre-assembled. The legs swing down and fold back under nicely. The laminate board is thicker than I expected, so it's a pleasant surprise. The bean bags seem durable too, not cheap or thin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bean bags unsatisfactory..
customer_reviews.text: The boards were extremely sturdy and durable.. The bean bags are very cheaply made and I had to continually sew them up... They need to have reenforced stitching around the edges. The beans are in plastic so they didn't escape but not well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Not great......
customer_reviews.text: This was the least expensive game around. I guess you get what you pay for. We have used it a few times and there is A LOT of white powder that comes out of the "bean bags"! The boards are not high quality......not solid wood. They are also too slick.....we had to sand them down before we could use the game! I sadly do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: WendyL

customer_reviews.title: Best Boards I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, official size, very durable, and the bags are made in good thick material with flawless stitching. The real deal from top to bottom and I highly recommend them to anyone who is serious about corn hole. Family fun in the back yard and camp ground or tournament settings either way these boards are perfect for every occasion!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boards ok bags are terrible.  not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Boards are ok, came dented, sketched & used looking. bags that came with it broke apart within hours. I will not recommend this to a friend. This product was probably worth $75 at most.
customer_reviews.author: donnie

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered alot of things from Amazon in the past. I was extremely disappointed on the Cornhole Game. The wood is very low grade
customer_reviews.author: Lori Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a good set. Velcro's together with a rope handle to carry. Fun play
customer_reviews.author: R. McLellan

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two sets and both were broke when received
customer_reviews.text: The first set had dents and were missing pieces. The second set the nails were popping through the board.
customer_reviews.author: globe.trotter

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive for the quality - but good quality and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I was expecting better quality. Used three times and had to sew a bag that's seem cane loose. And the board quality is cheap. Kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Stanislaw

customer_reviews.title: The boards are great but I would recommend buying different bean bags
customer_reviews.text: The boards are great but I would recommend buying different bean bags. We were really disappointed when the bags started breaking after 1 round of playing. If you purchase this set, be sure to buy different bags from a local sporting good store or another vendor on amazon. It is disappointing to have the bags break so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: The item came damaged. Not only was it cracked, it had pain all over the face of each board. This was a birthday gift that was intended to be used that evening. It was an embarrassment to have given someone that gift in that condition.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gehrmann

customer_reviews.title: Bags are garbage
customer_reviews.text: The board was nice but every time the bags were thrown smoke came out of the bags. After playing for an hour 2 of the bags broke open. If you buy this product buy another set of bags because the bags that come with this are garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Baldi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: If a little heavier would have been better, but a very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Claude Miller

customer_reviews.title: not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: One of the boards had a crack and first time using it a bag split and needed sewn then second time a second bag. Haven't used a third time yet but I dont have high hopes for it holding up. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beard

customer_reviews.title: They serve their purpose but they are cheaply made. ...
customer_reviews.text: They serve their purpose but they are cheaply made. If the boards ever got wet they would be ruined. Bags started releasing powder immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea B.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and delivered quickly already put together
customer_reviews.text: So well made and having the top be slippery adds to the game! Awesome purchase no negatives!
customer_reviews.author: sherry m

customer_reviews.title: one of the four boards we bought is completley different
customer_reviews.text: So we bought the Max amount of boards you can buy for our Cornhole League. We got 3 that all looked the same and the boards were good. The 4th one is SUPER shinny and the bags don't stick at all. We tried it twice now and it's a clear difference. Attached is a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Family

customer_reviews.title: ... mixed reviews on this item but we are very happy with it very good quality and looks great was ...
customer_reviews.text: There was mixed reviews on this item but we are very happy with it very good quality and looks great was a hit with the family
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Rojas

customer_reviews.title: The boards are great. The issue is the bags themselves
customer_reviews.text: The boards are great. The issue is the bags themselves. I had 3 of the bags bust open on the first day we used them. The bags material are heavy duty but the stitching is not. So be prepared to bust out your needle and tread. For the price we paid i thought they would last a little while longer.
customer_reviews.author: paul diaz

customer_reviews.title: very nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: these were shipped quickly, they are nice, have a handle, bags in the box and just what we ordered.. cant wait til spring with our son and his family can pull them out and start playing
customer_reviews.author: sstude

customer_reviews.title: Bought for the office
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our office and branded it. For the price, its a well made product and everyone at work enjoyed playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Inferior corn bags.
customer_reviews.text: The bags came apart in two days. The boards are high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brad H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Board
customer_reviews.text: Great board but the bags split open half way into our first game and beads fell out. Please contact me to resolve.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: 6 of the 8 bean bags ripped during the first use. the top panels are very thin and cheap. they will not hold up to the outdoors
customer_reviews.author: DAVID Q

customer_reviews.title: It looks like junk, and I'd rather sand whatever material is ...
customer_reviews.text: Whatever is on the face of the board is peeling up. This was already happening when I opened my package. What is underneath it? If I peel it all off, could this make it work? It looks like junk, and I'd rather sand whatever material is under the sticky film. Would this be possible?
customer_reviews.author: R. Field

customer_reviews.title: Breaking apart at the seams
customer_reviews.text: The bean bags starting falling apart during our very first game. Att first it was just two bags, and then in our second game another two bags started falling apart at the seams. The seams are not done well!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice game and I like that it can be painted ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice game and I like that it can be painted in any design. Fun and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality on the bags.
customer_reviews.text: The boards are as good as it gets. The bags on the other hand did not wear well. I had to sew 4 of the bags back together, the boards and bags were used on 2 occasions. Here is a picture of 3 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Bags didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: Boards are great but the bags broke open after 2 uses. We ended up having to purchase bags from another supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M

customer_reviews.title: Good product!!
customer_reviews.text: Our family has had a blast with this!! Very sturdy and well made! Great product!! And I love the fact it is regulation size. NOT the small corn hole game. :)
customer_reviews.author: P. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Overall poor quality. We ended up returning them
customer_reviews.text: Bean bag broke open during the first game. Overall poor quality. We ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well built!! Only recommendation is upgrading the legs to 2x4's. Make it much sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: AMoney

customer_reviews.title: The product is just ok. We paid $100 and ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is just ok. We paid $100 and for that cost should not be finding the top and edges severely chipping. This is creating areas where someone, including myself, could get cuts from the chipped edges.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy A. Corrado

customer_reviews.title: Broken bags
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets of these boards for a bar bags league and ALL of the bags have broken open within 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kurly7

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move
customer_reviews.text: Easy to move, very lightweight. Board is laminate and very slick for bags. Looks a little cheap and will easily break if not handled well
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Bean bag toss
customer_reviews.text: Nice size regulation game. Arrived with a few edges damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Black

customer_reviews.title: Not  durable
customer_reviews.text: Whateveryou do dont leave outside in rain for a night! Not durable at all, pulled them in the next day and now they have mold in them and the woodgrain is removing itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jose J. Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Bags rip open
customer_reviews.text: The board is great we played about three games and the bags started to open up and rip now every time I play another bag leaks
customer_reviews.author: mike shaw

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: "All wood"LOL, Wood is made from trees. Cardboard is made from trees, that means cardboard is wood. This product is made of all wood. You guys are liars
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Vargas Brown

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Cheesy product. spend a little more and get something better quality. I did.
customer_reviews.author: JC288

customer_reviews.title: Played 2x
customer_reviews.text: Played with this twice since buying it. One bag has already split open.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L.

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage, all wood=press wood. I was hoping for the best, but should have read everyone else's comments before purchasing. DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: @distressions

customer_reviews.title: Rainproof??
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty good. Don’t know if it would hold up in the rain
customer_reviews.author: bill bizub

customer_reviews.title: Defective item
customer_reviews.text: The bags are not good at all. Within the first game played the seams of the bags started corking apart and the insides coming out
customer_reviews.author: crystal humbert

customer_reviews.title: The faux wood laminate does chip easily but other than that it is constructed fairly well
customer_reviews.text: The faux wood laminate does chip easily but other than that it is constructed fairly well. I lovedette that it was already assembled so my family could play as soon as it was out of the box. Lots of family fun!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: very nice design and look. Locks together via velcro strips for easy carrying. Nice extra.
customer_reviews.author: kcurran

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expected
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift. They were good quality and exactly what we were expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Boards are good, bags not so much
customer_reviews.text: The boards seemed to hold up good after the first weekend of use, the beanbags however are extremely cheap and 5 of the 8 had to be sewn back up after the first 2 days of use.
customer_reviews.author: heckster

customer_reviews.title: Well build. Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Very well build not to heavy. Quality throughout!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Olentangy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great product! They have been rained on and climbed on by my 2 year old...we have had this for a year and no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family reunion. And after the first few throws the bags broke open! We spent more time sewing the bags together than we did playing! Do not waste your money on this! You can see from the picture how they are ALL resewn by US!
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great game, perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for my beach house rental. Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Boards are sturdy, however
customer_reviews.text: Boards are sturdy, however, some of the laminate has already chipped off after 1 day of use. Also the bags are really cheap and already have several holes in them and are losing the stuffing. I would definately get some different bags, these do not hold up at all.
customer_reviews.author: RealtorKim

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed the first time we used it the bean bags ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed the first time we used it the bean bags ripped and beans fell out. A pain when you are on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Foster

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The boards are nice but bags fell completely apart after 2 games.
customer_reviews.author: burningrubber

customer_reviews.title: The quality was not what I expected,
customer_reviews.text: The quality was not what I expected, trying to return but having difficulty finding correct information on how to return it
customer_reviews.author: Peg zmrhal

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS ADVERTISED!
customer_reviews.text: Description says 'all wood' or 'wooden,' and they are NOT! The surface is really cheap particle board covered with a wood-look sticker that is way too slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Cracked and chipped
customer_reviews.text: It arrived kinda busted up. I was applying a decal and had already thrown the box away. Probably should have returned it and then this review would likely be better.
customer_reviews.author: marc milanich

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is very low quality. It is constructed of flimsy material rather than real wood. We played a few games of cornhole on them one day and they were already beginning to fall apart. These would probably be okay for kids, but for adults who play on a fairly regular basis, keep shopping around.
customer_reviews.author: RC4L

customer_reviews.title: Buy new bags
customer_reviews.text: The boards are nice but im not use to playing with small bags they dont seem to be the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Minor

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Boards are great, bags included aweful. Half broke first time used. Now have to buy new bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some of the bags are separating at the seams and we haven't even played it yet.......
customer_reviews.author: monti q hansard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: made very well and heavy. We've played several times and this is great
customer_reviews.author: ie

customer_reviews.title: stand needs to be better.
customer_reviews.text: Not what was expected, poorly built, stand needs to be better.
customer_reviews.author: WENDY

customer_reviews.title: Bad bags one game
customer_reviews.text: The first game the bags broke we played the next game with 3 bags 3rd game another bag blew out. Good price so far for the boards bags are a zero
customer_reviews.author: Xo

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: this is made out of 1x2's instead of 2x4's it is flimsy and cheaply made the legs are very unstable and easily bent out of shape
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine Drayton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome although bean bags opened on first few throws so ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome although bean bags opened on first few throws so we had to sew them better .. Other than that it was fine
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: A real disappointment. Had to repair with needle and thread
customer_reviews.text: Bags seams on 2 of 8 bags have separated along sewn seam. A real disappointment. Had to repair with needle and thread.
customer_reviews.author: Ned Arcouette

customer_reviews.title: Do not put decals on this product
customer_reviews.text: Just got this product and put decals on it, when removing the backing of the decal it removed some of the laminate. I would not recommend putting decals on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it.. It was a gift and the intended parties loved it... Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bag quality was very poor, 2 bags tore open after only three games.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The supporting legs are made of a weak balsa like wood. I expect we will need to replace them very soon. The "bean" bags are strangely dusty.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Summer Henderson

customer_reviews.title: would be much longer lasting if the two sides had ...
customer_reviews.text: would be much longer lasting if the two sides had been made with plywood and not mdf. Mdf can not handle any moisture at all.
customer_reviews.author: robert godsoe

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The bags broke open in the first half hour of use.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Mattes

customer_reviews.title: Bags split open!
customer_reviews.text: I would never recommend this product. After three games, the bags started splitting open. By the time we had played ten games, we had 18 repairs to seven of the eight bags. If you purchase this product, you better have a roll of duck tape handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a quality game board and we have had a great time playing
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality game board and we have had a great time playing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Culpepper

product_meta.title: Outdoor Cornhole Lawn Game Set-Family Friendly, Fun for Kids and Perfect for Your Next Tailgate- Official Size Boards and Bags by Hey! Play!
product_meta.description:
The fun and family friendly outdoor Cornhole Game Set by Hey! Play! includes two durable wooden regulation sized boards with collapsing legs and eight beanbags. This bag toss game is easy to play for kids of all ages, and is perfect for your next cook out, picnic or tailgate. 

IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. Hey! Play! is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products, which we ensure by applying a rigorous Quality Control process.
feature_bullets: REGULATION SIZED BOARDS- This fun outdoor cornhole set includes two regulation sized wooden game boards. Well-made and sturdy, this full-sized lawn game should last for years to come.
COMPLETE CORNHOLE GAME SET- Set includes eight (2 sets of 4) regulation sized bean bags, so you have everything that you and your kids need to play this family friendly bag toss game.

EASY STORAGE- Equipped with side handles and board legs that fold down for easy travel and storage. Take this fun outside game along to a tailgate party, then easily store away until you want to bring it out again at your next family barbeque.
PRODUCT DETAILS- Set includes two 2’x 4’ game boards with collapsible legs and side handles. Eight regulation sized beanbags (4 red and 4 blue) also included.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED– Hey! Play! is committed to providing consumers with the absolute best price and value on our products. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of Hey! Play! and ONLY Cornhole Game Set is GUARANTEED to be genuine.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
